Sentencas: With the current progress in solid oxide cell (SOC) technology towards commercial products, better durability is vital.
Titulo: Degradation studies using machine learning on novel solid oxide cell database

Sentencas: Continuous advancements in technology and material discovery demand the understanding of underlying degradation mechanisms.
Titulo: Degradation studies using machine learning on novel solid oxide cell database

Sentencas: It remains a challenge to experimentally assess the lifetime using conventional mapping by long-term testing.
Titulo: Degradation studies using machine learning on novel solid oxide cell database

Sentencas: In this work, a statistical approach based on machine learning was utilized for assessing the lifetime of SOCs.
Titulo: Degradation studies using machine learning on novel solid oxide cell database

Sentencas: An in-house SOC dataset consisting of about 2135 tests under different test conditions over the past ca.
Titulo: Degradation studies using machine learning on novel solid oxide cell database

Sentencas: 20 years with different cell materials was used as the basis for a novel database.
Titulo: Degradation studies using machine learning on novel solid oxide cell database

Sentencas: Degradation parameters were defined using values obtained from impedance analysis at open-circuit voltage before (and after) durability testing and parameters recorded during the durability tests.
Titulo: Degradation studies using machine learning on novel solid oxide cell database

Sentencas: To apply machine learning approaches, data visualization was first carried out, followed by correlation analysis between the different input parameters.
Titulo: Degradation studies using machine learning on novel solid oxide cell database

Sentencas: Machine learning approaches such as single and multivariable linear regression were applied.
Titulo: Degradation studies using machine learning on novel solid oxide cell database

Sentencas: Such a study on a diverse dataset would enable an inclusive lifetime prediction for wider datasets, independent of changes in testing environments as well as for various cell operation modes.
Titulo: Degradation studies using machine learning on novel solid oxide cell database
